mapper.select: select id, no, model_id, batch_id, status, expiration_start_time,years, expiration_end_time, create_time,update_time ,del_flag, cache, test_start_time, test_end_time, test_msg from t_product_new where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_product_new(no, model_id, batch_id, status, expiration_start_time, years, expiration_end_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag, cache, serial_num, supplier_id, type, code, test_start_time, test_end_time, test_msg,device_name,product_key,is_use,cabinet_sn) values (#{no}, #{modelId}, #{batchId}, #{status}, #{expirationStartTime},#{years},#{expirationEndTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag}, #{cache},#{serialNum}, #{supplierId}, #{type}, #{code}, #{testStartTime}, #{testEndTime}, #{testMsg},#{deviceName},#{productKey},#{isUse},#{cabinetSn})
mapper.update:
update t_product_new
no = #{no},
model_id = #{modelId},
batch_id = #{batchId},
status = #{status},
expiration_start_time = #{expirationStartTime},
years = #{years},
expiration_end_time = #{expirationEndTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
remarks = #{remarks},
app_version = #{appVersion},
sys_version = #{sysVersion},
test_start_time = #{testStartTime},
test_end_time = #{testEndTime},
test_msg = #{testMsg},
where id = #{id}

update t_product_new
no = #{no},
model_id = #{modelId},
batch_id = #{batchId},
status = #{status},
expiration_start_time = #{expirationStartTime},
years = #{years},
expiration_end_time = #{expirationEndTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
remarks = #{remarks},
app_version = #{appVersion},
sys_version = #{sysVersion},
test_start_time = #{testStartTime},
test_end_time = #{testEndTime},
test_msg = #{testMsg},
test_result = #{testResult},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update t_product_new set del_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select tpn.no as sn, tpn.test_result as test_status, tpn.test_start_time, tpn.test_end_time, tpn.test_msg, ptc.content, ptc.test_content_result from t_product_new tpn left join t_product_new_test_content ptc on tpn.id = ptc.pid where tpn.id = #{pid}
select t.id as product_id, t.product_key,t.device_name,t.is_use, pr.box_number from t_product_new t left join product pr on t.model_id = pr.id where t.del_flag = 0 and t.no = #{no}
update t_product_new set is_use=0,update_time= #{updateTime} where no = #{no} and del_flag = 0
